HDG.BC.content: no timeless rule in meleta to pan, remembering what is incipient and deciding what is yet to come, must single out the Greek thought as 1st beginning, but not as a rule [how is this distinction made?]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: no timeless rule in meleta to pan, remembering what is incipient and deciding what is yet to come, must single out the Greek thought as 1st beginning, but not as a rule [how is this distinction made?]

HDG.BC.content: we are always that being concerned with Being [Being needs man] > Being always reliable, yet, re: its rank, is the most forgotten, permits us to be beings in midst of beings: Being re-members (Er-innert) us into beings and about beings, Being is iteslf what re-members, authentic remembrance
HDG.BC.linkedContent: we are always that being concerned with Being [Being needs man] > Being always reliable, yet, re: its rank, is the most forgotten, permits us to be beings in midst of beings: Being re-members (Er-innert) us into beings and about beings, Being is iteslf what re-members, authentic remembrance

HDG.BC.content: Being withdraws from us when we say it > “Being has singularly burst open our human essence” > “we belong to Being, and yet not” >  homeless in our ownmost homeland, not directly allowed in—assuming we may thus name our own essence
HDG.BC.linkedContent: Being withdraws from us when we say it > “Being has singularly burst open our human essence” > “we belong to Being, and yet not” > homeless in our ownmost homeland, not directly allowed in—assuming we may thus name our own essence

HDG.IWM.content: thinking that sets out to experience ground of metaphysics, attempt to recall truth of Being > [totally other, beyond Being] from point of view of metaphysics ground appears as ground [cf. 279n Being as nonground (Nichtgrund), X ground], presumably something else experienced in its own terms, something as yet unsaid, something other than metaphysics
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: thinking that sets out to experience ground of metaphysics, attempt to recall truth of Being > [totally other, beyond Being] from point of view of metaphysics ground appears as ground [cf. 279n Being as nonground (Nichtgrund), X ground], presumably something else experienced in its own terms, something as yet unsaid, something other than metaphysics

HDG.IWM.content: thinking attempted in Being and Time is “under way (unterwegs)” toward bringing thinking onto a way, toward opening a path for thinking [not there yet, telos, preparatory, provisional] > how could this conjecture (experienced here [really???]), that relation of Being to human essence belongs to Being itself, become explicit before every attempt to liberate Dasein from subjectivity, etc. [had to go through destruction via meaning of Being to think truth of Being]
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: thinking attempted in Being and Time is “under way (unterwegs)” toward bringing thinking onto a way, toward opening a path for thinking [not there yet, telos, preparatory, provisional] > how could this conjecture (experienced here [really???]), that relation of Being to human essence belongs to Being itself, become explicit before every attempt to liberate Dasein from subjectivity, etc. [had to go through destruction via meaning of Being to think truth of Being]

HDG.IWM.content: time belongs to truth of Being in a way still concealed > every holding open of truth of Being must look toward time as possible horizon of an understanding of Being [not there yet, telos] > time as provisional goal in Being and Time ——[nice, clever] proof of oblivion of Being, the reception of Being and Time ——ontotheology (first philosophy, philosophy proper) as twofold: truth of beings in their universality & in highest being
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: time belongs to truth of Being in a way still concealed > every holding open of truth of Being must look toward time as possible horizon of an understanding of Being [not there yet, telos] > time as provisional goal in Being and Time ——[nice, clever] proof of oblivion of Being, the reception of Being and Time ——ontotheology (first philosophy, philosophy proper) as twofold: truth of beings in their universality & in highest being

HDG.IWM.content: fundamental ontology (attempt to inquire back), like any title, soon seen to be inappropriate [beyond Being then?], misleading because says something correct from point of view of metaphysics > what matters is undertaking transition [not there yet] from metaphysics to recalling truth of Being > thinking that calls itself “fundamental ontology” blocks/obscures its own path by very designation > attempt to recall truth of Being, going back into ground of metaphysics [Destruction], already left realm of all ontology w/ 1st step [was that step ever taken?] > wherever indirect/direct representation of “transcendence” remains: ontology [cf. On The Essence of Ground p. 125] [cf. OG pp. 22-3]
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: fundamental ontology (attempt to inquire back), like any title, soon seen to be inappropriate [beyond Being then?], misleading because says something correct from point of view of metaphysics > what matters is undertaking transition [not there yet] from metaphysics to recalling truth of Being > thinking that calls itself “fundamental ontology” blocks/obscures its own path by very designation > attempt to recall truth of Being, going back into ground of metaphysics [Destruction], already left realm of all ontology w/ 1st step [was that step ever taken?] > wherever indirect/direct representation of “transcendence” remains: ontology [cf. On The Essence of Ground p. 125] [cf. OG pp. 22-3]

HDG.QB.content: reciprocal exchange of rationalism/irrationalism [domination of ratio] denies possibility of thought outside this alternative > such a thinking could be prepared by tentative steps [not there yet, telos] of historical elucidation, reflection, discussion
HDG.QB.linkedContent: reciprocal exchange of rationalism/irrationalism [domination of ratio] denies possibility of thought outside this alternative > such a thinking could be prepared by tentative steps [not there yet, telos] of historical elucidation, reflection, discussion

HDG.QB.content: Heidegger confesses: “I myself was not focused enough to articulate w/ sufficient clarity the reasons for my suggestion” [re: why he encouraged Jünger to reissue The Worker in original form] > now the time may have become more ready to say something [only may, not there yet]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: Heidegger confesses: “I myself was not focused enough to articulate w/ sufficient clarity the reasons for my suggestion” [re: why he encouraged Jünger to reissue The Worker in original form] > now the time may have become more ready to say something [only may, not there yet]

HDG.QB.content: [immense degree of waiting] perhaps moment will come [not yet] when essence of nihilism will show itself more clearly in other ways, in brighter light, until then setting out on a path that leads to a discussion of essence of Being, on this path alone can question concerning the nothing be discussed (must relinquish language of metaphysics [does that include Being?], but [still?] subject to other demands than changing an old terminology for a new one [paleonym] > endeavor to undertake transformation will presumably remain tentative for a long time [not yet there, telos], that’s not an adequate reason for failing to undertake it
HDG.QB.linkedContent: [immense degree of waiting] perhaps moment will come [not yet] when essence of nihilism will show itself more clearly in other ways, in brighter light, until then setting out on a path that leads to a discussion of essence of Being, on this path alone can question concerning the nothing be discussed (must relinquish language of metaphysics [does that include Being?], but [still?] subject to other demands than changing an old terminology for a new one [paleonym] > endeavor to undertake transformation will presumably remain tentative for a long time [not yet there, telos], that’s not an adequate reason for failing to undertake it

HDG.QB.content: re: Jünger on crossing the line [“new turning of Being”]: “this sentence is easy to read and yet difficult to think”
HDG.QB.linkedContent: re: Jünger on crossing the line [“new turning of Being”]: “this sentence is easy to read and yet difficult to think”

HDG.QB.content: overcoming of nihilism only possible when essence of nothing in its former kinship w/ “Being” can arrive (ankommen) and be accommodated (unterkommen) among us mortals [not yet there, telos]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: overcoming of nihilism only possible when essence of nothing in its former kinship w/ “Being” can arrive (ankommen) and be accommodated (unterkommen) among us mortals [not yet there, telos]

HDG.QB.content: people have tended to represent “oblivion of being” as if Being were an umbrella forgotten by some philosophy professor [Nietzsche, cf. S] > oblivion, concealing of as yet unrevealed essence (Wesen) (verbal—essential unfolding) of X Being, shelters (birgt) untapped treasures, promise (Versprechen) of a find that awaits appropriate seeking (das gemässe Suchen wartet) > to have premonition (vermuten) of this doesn’t require prophetic gifts but only attentiveness (Achtung), practiced for decades, to that announced (bekundet) in metaphysical thinking [Heidegger’s askesis]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: people have tended to represent “oblivion of being” as if Being were an umbrella forgotten by some philosophy professor [Nietzsche, cf. S] > oblivion, concealing of as yet unrevealed essence (Wesen) (verbal—essential unfolding) of X Being, shelters (birgt) untapped treasures, promise (Versprechen) of a find that awaits appropriate seeking (das gemässe Suchen wartet) > to have premonition (vermuten) of this doesn’t require prophetic gifts but only attentiveness (Achtung), practiced for decades, to that announced (bekundet) in metaphysical thinking [Heidegger’s askesis]

HDG.QB.content: recollective thinking (Andenken) has task of attending to this concealment, in which unconcealment is grounded [how do you know that, if its essence has not yet been revealed?] > recollect not what becomes past: but all enduring (allem Währen) that each case (je) of Ereignis of X Being grants (gewährt)
HDG.QB.linkedContent: recollective thinking (Andenken) has task of attending to this concealment, in which unconcealment is grounded [how do you know that, if its essence has not yet been revealed?] > recollect not what becomes past: but all enduring (allem Währen) that each case (je) of Ereignis of X Being grants (gewährt)

HDG.QB.content: recovery (Verwindung) of metaphysics is recovery of oblivion of Being, recovery turns (Verwindung wendet sich) toward essence of metaphysics > in order to respond to recovery must first clarify essence of metaphysics [not yet there? Destruction still required?] > “in this recovery, the enduring truth (bleibende Wahrheit) of metaphysics that has seemingly been rejected first returns explicitly (kehrt erst eigens zurück) as the now appropriated (angeeignetes) essence of metaphysics”
HDG.QB.linkedContent: recovery (Verwindung) of metaphysics is recovery of oblivion of Being, recovery turns (Verwindung wendet sich) toward essence of metaphysics > in order to respond to recovery must first clarify essence of metaphysics [not yet there? Destruction still required?] > “in this recovery, the enduring truth (bleibende Wahrheit) of metaphysics that has seemingly been rejected first returns explicitly (kehrt erst eigens zurück) as the now appropriated (angeeignetes) essence of metaphysics”

HDG.QB.content: nothing is not beings but nevertheless given: Being & nothing employ (verwendet) themselves one for the other in kinship (Verwandtschaft) whose essential fullness [why full?] we’ve scarcely heeded (kaum bedacht) [not yet there] > there is a giving (Es gibt) > Being no more “is” than nothing: Es gibt both [giving then beyond Being?]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: nothing is not beings but nevertheless given: Being & nothing employ (verwendet) themselves one for the other in kinship (Verwandtschaft) whose essential fullness [why full?] we’ve scarcely heeded (kaum bedacht) [not yet there] > there is a giving (Es gibt) > Being no more “is” than nothing: Es gibt both [giving then beyond Being?]

HDG.QB.content: in nihilism, fail to heed (achten) what is meant by oblivion of concealment of X Being > turning into essence of nihilism (die Einkehr in sein Wesen): first step prior to leaving nihilism behind, this turning in has a direction of turning back (Rückkehr) [not there yet]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: in nihilism, fail to heed (achten) what is meant by oblivion of concealment of X Being > turning into essence of nihilism (die Einkehr in sein Wesen): first step prior to leaving nihilism behind, this turning in has a direction of turning back (Rückkehr) [not there yet]

HDG.QB.content: [Heidegger’s method as Destruction then building (for dwelling)?] build path (Weg) leads back to locality (Ortschaft) of recovery (Verwindung) of metaphysics to let us journey through what is destined in overcoming (Überwindung) nihilism [not there yet, narrative yet to come] > despite rejection of text for publication [annihilation of trace], he who learns must examine more originarily, w/ greater care, the saying of reflective thinking, might leave such saying in realm of mystery one day, as highest gift (höchstes Geschenk) & greatest danger [beyond Being, the worst, totally other, risk annihilation?]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: [Heidegger’s method as Destruction then building (for dwelling)?] build path (Weg) leads back to locality (Ortschaft) of recovery (Verwindung) of metaphysics to let us journey through what is destined in overcoming (Überwindung) nihilism [not there yet, narrative yet to come] > despite rejection of text for publication [annihilation of trace], he who learns must examine more originarily, w/ greater care, the saying of reflective thinking, might leave such saying in realm of mystery one day, as highest gift (höchstes Geschenk) & greatest danger [beyond Being, the worst, totally other, risk annihilation?]

HDG.FS.content: Hegel’s “non-conscious (das Bewusstlose)” evokes Freud, but difference is extreme: Freud’s unconscious (das Unbewusste) doesn’t belong “in consciousness,” whereas for Hegel, difference btwn conscious/non-conscious belongs to consciousness, constructed in consciousness as the Absolute (which is both) > for Hegel [?], non-conscious means not yet posited/sublated
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Hegel’s “non-conscious (das Bewusstlose)” evokes Freud, but difference is extreme: Freud’s unconscious (das Unbewusste) doesn’t belong “in consciousness,” whereas for Hegel, difference btwn conscious/non-conscious belongs to consciousness, constructed in consciousness as the Absolute (which is both) > for Hegel [?], non-conscious means not yet posited/sublated

HDG.FS.content: Hegel obstructs access (Zugang) to Greek meaning of being from ground up when he claims Greeks had yet to think subjective as mediation, i.e. as core (Kern) of objectivity > Hegel excludes himself from Greek experience of being as phenomenon
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Hegel obstructs access (Zugang) to Greek meaning of being from ground up when he claims Greeks had yet to think subjective as mediation, i.e. as core (Kern) of objectivity > Hegel excludes himself from Greek experience of being as phenomenon

HDG.FS.content: there is a return to beginning in Being and Time, but it is through destruction, dismantling, disintegration (Auflösung) (which is sometimes awkward [ungeschickt] [?]) of what is destined as being in metaphysics > not yet in Being and Time a genuine knowledge of history of being, hence the awkwardness, naiveté of “ontological destruction” > since then, unavoidable naiveté of novice gave way to a knowing [he arrived, no more destruction?]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: there is a return to beginning in Being and Time, but it is through destruction, dismantling, disintegration (Auflösung) (which is sometimes awkward [ungeschickt] [?]) of what is destined as being in metaphysics > not yet in Being and Time a genuine knowledge of history of being, hence the awkwardness, naiveté of “ontological destruction” > since then, unavoidable naiveté of novice gave way to a knowing [he arrived, no more destruction?]

HDG.LP.content: indeterminacy of animal face in Trakl, not yet gathered into its essential being, the thinking animal, animal rationale, man
HDG.LP.linkedContent: indeterminacy of animal face in Trakl, not yet gathered into its essential being, the thinking animal, animal rationale, man

HDG.LP.content: the indeterminacy of man [via Trakl] means man is all too firmly confirmed as factum (Tatsache) [factical life], not yet been gathered/brought (gebracht) to firm ground (Feste), “home,” in das Einheimische ihres verhüllten Wesens > Western-European metaphysics may be struggling in vain, its way to the Unterwegs may be blocked: modern man is the animal not yet determined (fest-gestellte Tier) in its nature
HDG.LP.linkedContent: the indeterminacy of man [via Trakl] means man is all too firmly confirmed as factum (Tatsache) [factical life], not yet been gathered/brought (gebracht) to firm ground (Feste), “home,” in das Einheimische ihres verhüllten Wesens > Western-European metaphysics may be struggling in vain, its way to the Unterwegs may be blocked: modern man is the animal not yet determined (fest-gestellte Tier) in its nature

HDG.LP.content: [2 kinds of “a dead”] Elis doesn’t decay/cease to be, he moves away into earliness > “stranger unfolds human nature forward into the beginning” of what has not yet come to be carried (Tragen, giberan) > Trakl calls this quieter/stilling element: the unborn (Ungeborene) > “something strange” = “something unborn”
HDG.LP.linkedContent: [2 kinds of “a dead”] Elis doesn’t decay/cease to be, he moves away into earliness > “stranger unfolds human nature forward into the beginning” of what has not yet come to be carried (Tragen, giberan) > Trakl calls this quieter/stilling element: the unborn (Ungeborene) > “something strange” = “something unborn”

HDG.WL.content: [method] speak about speech qua speech (Die Sprache als die Sprache zur Sprache bringen): each Sprache says something different yet the Same > this Same, the oneness that’s the distinctive property of language, holds together (zueinanderhält) what is kept separate (Auseinandergehaltene)
HDG.WL.linkedContent: [method] speak about speech qua speech (Die Sprache als die Sprache zur Sprache bringen): each Sprache says something different yet the Same > this Same, the oneness that’s the distinctive property of language, holds together (zueinanderhält) what is kept separate (Auseinandergehaltene)

HDG.WL.content: everything spoken stems, in many ways, from unspoken (either not yet spoken or beyond reach of speaking) > so that which is spoken can appear cut off from speaking/speakers, but it alone offers (entgegenhält) what they attend to (verhalten), regardless of how they stay (aufhalten) w/in spoken/unspoken
HDG.WL.linkedContent: everything spoken stems, in many ways, from unspoken (either not yet spoken or beyond reach of speaking) > so that which is spoken can appear cut off from speaking/speakers, but it alone offers (entgegenhält) what they attend to (verhalten), regardless of how they stay (aufhalten) w/in spoken/unspoken

HDG.WL.content: diversity of elements in language, an original count (Zählen) not yet enumerable, a belonging together shows itself (ergab sich) > the count is a recounting that anticipates (auf vorblickt) the Einigende im Zusammengëhoren, but can’t make it appear > long history of inability to experience unifying unity of Sprachwesens, thus it remains w/out a name
HDG.WL.linkedContent: diversity of elements in language, an original count (Zählen) not yet enumerable, a belonging together shows itself (ergab sich) > the count is a recounting that anticipates (auf vorblickt) the Einigende im Zusammengëhoren, but can’t make it appear > long history of inability to experience unifying unity of Sprachwesens, thus it remains w/out a name

HDG.WL.content: what is unspoken doesn’t just lack voice, it is what remains unsaid (Ungesagte), the not yet shown, that which has yet to reach appearance > that which must remain unspoken is Geheimnis (secret, mystery), abides (verweilt) in concealment as unshowable
HDG.WL.linkedContent: what is unspoken doesn’t just lack voice, it is what remains unsaid (Ungesagte), the not yet shown, that which has yet to reach appearance > that which must remain unspoken is Geheimnis (secret, mystery), abides (verweilt) in concealment as unshowable

HDG.EC.content: we are not yet standing truly free in the midst of the essence of devastation > we must be granted (vergönnt) the privilege (Gunst) of this thinking > devastation is a far-reaching event (vorausgreifendes Ereignis), one that suffocates possibility for something essential to arise/bloom [Bataille’s restricted economy]
HDG.EC.linkedContent: we are not yet standing truly free in the midst of the essence of devastation > we must be granted (vergönnt) the privilege (Gunst) of this thinking > devastation is a far-reaching event (vorausgreifendes Ereignis), one that suffocates possibility for something essential to arise/bloom [Bataille’s restricted economy]

HDG.EC.content: death itself: something that waits in us > death waits upon our waiting > may we even ask what we wait for if we are properly waiting? [beyond Being] > when we wait upon something: Erwarten, in awaiting pure waiting is disturbed > pure waiting: wait upon nothing > but if we specifically wait upon Nothing, we are awaiting again > pure waiting: to wait on that which corresponds (entspricht) to pure waiting, better yet, that which answers (antwortet) pure waiting
HDG.EC.linkedContent: death itself: something that waits in us > death waits upon our waiting > may we even ask what we wait for if we are properly waiting? [beyond Being] > when we wait upon something: Erwarten, in awaiting pure waiting is disturbed > pure waiting: wait upon nothing > but if we specifically wait upon Nothing, we are awaiting again > pure waiting: to wait on that which corresponds (entspricht) to pure waiting, better yet, that which answers (antwortet) pure waiting

HDG.EC.content: the unnecessary is most necessary of all, only one who has learned this understands pain of human barred from thinking > thinking is thus the unnecessary, and yet thinking has a high rank of honor: the highest > I know this but don’t know the Grund of this > as if Occident couldn’t wait until thinking finds its originary essence: perhaps pure waiting, ability to wait [slow down, hastiness (Übereilung) of thinking thought as ratio, rationality]
HDG.EC.linkedContent: the unnecessary is most necessary of all, only one who has learned this understands pain of human barred from thinking > thinking is thus the unnecessary, and yet thinking has a high rank of honor: the highest > I know this but don’t know the Grund of this > as if Occident couldn’t wait until thinking finds its originary essence: perhaps pure waiting, ability to wait [slow down, hastiness (Übereilung) of thinking thought as ratio, rationality]

HDG.EC.content: [facetiously?] what’s more necessary than “getting down to businesses with the given facts (Zupacken im Gegebenen), remaking what is present at hand, and moving forward w/ what has existed before (Vorwärtsbringen des Bisherigen)”? > that factual sense of reality (Tatsachensinn) lets man stand squarely on ground, validates, secures, effectuates (wirken), holds fast—and yet can’t be w/out the unnecessary (Unnötige)
HDG.EC.linkedContent: [facetiously?] what’s more necessary than “getting down to businesses with the given facts (Zupacken im Gegebenen), remaking what is present at hand, and moving forward w/ what has existed before (Vorwärtsbringen des Bisherigen)”? > that factual sense of reality (Tatsachensinn) lets man stand squarely on ground, validates, secures, effectuates (wirken), holds fast—and yet can’t be w/out the unnecessary (Unnötige)

HDG.OHF.content: historical consciousness gives itself task of overviewing “total fact of man (die ganze Tatsache Mensch),” bringing Dasein into view absolutely objectively > in this approach to past, the present of Dasein (Gegenwart des Daseins) is before itself in equally objective manner, & so is the future (not yet [Noch-nicht], just the present when calculated, anticipated by way of comparison): Spengler’s “decline of the West” not cheap witticism or whim, but consequential expression of historical consciousness: its inauthenticity thought through to the end [i.e. if we think of everything in this reductive way, then we have reduced our future]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: historical consciousness gives itself task of overviewing “total fact of man (die ganze Tatsache Mensch),” bringing Dasein into view absolutely objectively > in this approach to past, the present of Dasein (Gegenwart des Daseins) is before itself in equally objective manner, & so is the future (not yet [Noch-nicht], just the present when calculated, anticipated by way of comparison): Spengler’s “decline of the West” not cheap witticism or whim, but consequential expression of historical consciousness: its inauthenticity thought through to the end [i.e. if we think of everything in this reductive way, then we have reduced our future]

HDG.OHF.content: das Daseiende begegnet im Wie des Besorgtseins, d. h. im Da, das in ein Besorgen gestellt ist [hermeneutic circle?] > the being-there encountered has its own temporality, as cared for in a wider sense [?] > we are concerned for what is not yet, what is approaching: kairological moments of being-there [ek-stasis]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: das Daseiende begegnet im Wie des Besorgtseins, d. h. im Da, das in ein Besorgen gestellt ist [hermeneutic circle?] > the being-there encountered has its own temporality, as cared for in a wider sense [?] > we are concerned for what is not yet, what is approaching: kairological moments of being-there [ek-stasis]
